com.camerontec.util.collection

Class DirectedGraph<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.util.collection.DirectedGraph<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Vertex type

    public final class DirectedGraph<E>
extends Object
    Represents a directed graph and provides operations on the graph.

    Instances of this class are not thread safe.
